TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A type of acupuncture in which a microwave device is attached to an acupuncture needle to give microwave radiation at an acupuncture point.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "acupuntura con microonda"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Tipo de acupuntura en la que se conecta un dispositivo de microonda a la aguja, para administrar radiación con microonda en un punto específico.
